name: Steam Dunkers
description:
Steam Dunkers is a 2D local multiplayer game set in a world of floating islands and steam powered rifles. Steam Dunkers focuses on action packed matches where up to four players can compete against each other to be the best Steam Dunker in the arena.

Each player carries his own steam rifle, a tool able to shoot powerful burst of air and generate a vacuum capable of sucking in many items. Once an object has been sucked in, it can be carried around and shot with the next air burst. Be careful, other players can do this too and they can also push back the projectiles you throw at them!

The game offers three game modes: “Elimination”, “King of the Hill” and “Last Man Standing”, each with its own maps and unique items to use. 

Use your mastery of the steam rifle to quickly move across maps full of dangers and bottomless pits and push your enemies to their demise to be the ultimate Steam Dunker!

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

Download, unzip, grab some friends, run the game and enjoy!
